synopsis:
A new film that was announced at the end of Season 2's second cour. It is scheduled to premiere in Fall 2022.

The story will center on a new country named Razha, located to the west of Tempest. Rimuru and his companions get involved in a long-running conspiracy that swirls around a girl with a mysterious power. Rimuru and his commander Benimaru also encounter another ogre survivor named Hiiro, who used to hold Benimaru in high regard.

title.jp: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Guren no Kizuna
